topDeals.name: Uranium ore
topDeals.description: While this small amount of uranium ore is pretty low on the radioactivity meter
fectures: it’s pretty weird that you can buy it from the same site where you get your gym socks.

topDeals.name: A cat butt tissue holder
fectures: This seems like the nicest thing to be plucked from a cat’s rear since, well, ever
who doesn’t like to be stared down with peering, inquisitive eyes each time they need to blow their nose?

topDeals.name: A bacon-scented mustache
topDeals.description: Now you can smell bacon all day in peace
fectures: its scent hidden in an inconspicuous piece of facial hair
Sure beats rubbing pig fat on your upper lip.
